user001.bio: Mom of two, loves outdoor activities and STEM education.

user002.bio: Single mom of a 5-year-old, passionate about community building.

user003.bio: Dad of twins, tech enthusiast, loves board games.

user004.bio: Working mom, loves yoga and mindfulness with kids.

user005.bio: Stay-at-home dad, former teacher, loves educational activities.

user006.bio: Mom of three, Korean-American, loves cultural activities.

user007.bio: Dad of one, fitness enthusiast, loves outdoor adventures.

user008.bio: Single mom, artist, loves creative activities with daughter.

user009.bio: Dad of two, engineer, loves building and construction activities.

user010.bio: Mom of twins, pediatrician, loves health and wellness activities.

peanuts.description: Peanut allergy - common and potentially severe

tree_nuts.name: tree nuts
tree_nuts.description: Tree nuts allergy (almonds, walnuts, cashews, etc.)

post001.title: Free kids books - moving soon
post001.description: Have a collection of children's books (ages 3-8) that we need to give away before moving. All in good condition, mostly picture books and early readers. Available for pickup this weekend.

post002.title: Looking for weekend babysitter
post002.description: Need a reliable babysitter for our 5-year-old twins this Saturday evening (6-10 PM). We're in the Mission area. Experience with twins preferred. Will pay $20/hour.

post003.title: Community Park Cleanup Event
post003.description: Join us this Sunday for a family-friendly park cleanup! We'll meet at Dolores Park at 9 AM. Bring gloves and we'll provide bags. Great way to teach kids about community service. Coffee and snacks provided.

post004.title: Best allergy-friendly restaurants?
post004.description: Looking for recommendations for restaurants that are good with food allergies. My 7-year-old has severe peanut and tree nut allergies. We're in the Castro area but willing to travel. Thanks!

post005.title: Yoga class for moms and kids
post005.description: Starting a new yoga class for moms and their kids (ages 3-8) at the local community center. Classes will be on Tuesday and Thursday mornings at 9 AM. $15 per class or $50 for the month. All levels welcome!

post006.title: Help needed - sick child
post006.description: My daughter is sick and I need someone to pick up her prescription from the pharmacy. I'm stuck at home with her. Pharmacy is on Market St. Will pay for your time and gas.

post007.title: Summer Reading Program Registration
post007.description: Registration is now open for the summer reading program at the local library! Kids can earn prizes for reading. Program runs June-August. Sign up at the library or online. Free for all families.

post008.title: How to handle screen time with teenagers?
post008.description: My 14-year-old son is spending way too much time on his phone and video games. What strategies have worked for other parents? Looking for advice on setting healthy boundaries without causing major conflicts.

post009.title: Free piano lessons for kids
post009.description: I'm a music teacher offering free piano lessons to children ages 6-12 who can't afford lessons. I have 3 spots available starting next month. Lessons will be 30 minutes once a week. Must have access to a piano or keyboard.

post010.title: Lost child's backpack - reward offered
post010.description: My 8-year-old lost his blue Spider-Man backpack yesterday afternoon near Dolores Park. It has his homework, lunchbox, and favorite toy inside. Offering $50 reward for its return. Please contact me if found!

activity001.title: STEM Learning Workshop
activity001.description: Hands-on science experiments for kids aged 5-8.

comment001.comment: This sounds perfect for my daughter! What experiments will you be doing?

comment002.comment: I can help bring some supplies if needed. My kids love science!

comment003.comment: Will there be any messy experiments? My twins love getting hands-on!

activity002.title: Community Potluck & Playdate
activity002.description: Bring a dish and join us for a fun community gathering.

comment001.comment: I'll bring my famous chocolate chip cookies!

comment002.comment: I'll bring some Korean dishes. Will there be allergy information posted?

comment003.comment: I'll bring a nut-free, dairy-free dessert for allergy-friendly options.

activity003.title: Board Game Night for Families
activity003.description: Family-friendly board games for all ages.

comment001.comment: I'll bring some kid-friendly games like Candy Land and Chutes & Ladders!

comment002.comment: I can bring some strategy games for older kids too.

comment003.comment: My kids love cooperative games. I'll bring a few!

activity004.title: Family Yoga in the Park
activity004.description: Gentle yoga session for parents and children.

comment001.comment: Perfect! My twins love doing yoga with me.

comment002.comment: Should we bring our own mats or will they be provided?

comment003.comment: My daughter is excited to try yoga!

activity005.title: Science Experiment Day
activity005.description: Fun and safe science experiments for curious kids.

comment001.comment: My kids are so excited for this! What age range is this best for?

comment002.comment: My twins love experiments! Will there be any that involve food?

comment003.comment: I can help set up some engineering challenges too!

comment004.comment: Will there be any experiments suitable for younger kids?

activity006.title: Korean Culture Day
activity006.description: Learn about Korean culture through food, music, and crafts.

comment001.comment: This sounds amazing! My kids love trying new foods.

comment002.comment: Will there be allergy information for the food?

comment003.comment: I can help with some art activities if needed!

activity007.title: Family Fitness Bootcamp
activity007.description: High-energy workout for parents and kids.

comment001.comment: My twins need to burn off some energy! This is perfect.

comment003.comment: I'll bring some water bottles for everyone!

activity008.title: Art & Craft Workshop
activity008.description: Creative art projects for children of all ages.

comment001.comment: My daughter Emma loves art! She'll be so excited.

comment002.comment: Will there be any traditional Korean crafts?

comment003.comment: My kids love getting messy with paint!

activity009.title: Building & Construction Day
activity009.description: Learn basic building skills with safe tools and materials.

comment001.comment: My son Alex loves building! This is perfect for him.

comment002.comment: Will there be different difficulty levels for different ages?

comment003.comment: My son Jin is interested in engineering too!

activity010.title: Healthy Cooking for Kids
activity010.description: Learn to cook nutritious and delicious meals together.

comment001.comment: My daughter Sofia loves helping in the kitchen!

comment003.comment: This is perfect for teaching kids about healthy eating!

comment004.comment: Will the recipes be kid-friendly and simple?

resources.name: Maple Grove Playground
resources.description: Shaded playground with toddler-safe equipment and picnic areas.

review001.comment: Perfect playground for my 5-year-old! Lots of shade and clean equipment.

review002.comment: Great for toddlers, but could use more equipment for older kids.

review003.comment: Love the picnic areas! Perfect for family gatherings.

review004.comment: Well-maintained and safe. My daughter loves the swings!

review005.comment: Good playground but bathrooms could be cleaner.

resources.name: Community Health Clinic
resources.description: Family-friendly clinic with pediatric services.

review001.comment: Excellent pediatric care! Dr. Smith is wonderful with kids.

review002.comment: Great staff, but wait times can be long during flu season.

review003.comment: Very clean and child-friendly waiting area.

review004.comment: Good care but parking can be difficult.

resources.name: Central Library Children's Section
resources.description: Extensive children's book collection with reading programs.

review001.comment: Amazing selection of books! My kids love story time.

review002.comment: Great reading programs and helpful librarians.

review003.comment: Perfect place for educational activities. Love the STEM section!

review004.comment: Good collection but could use more diverse books.

review005.comment: Wonderful children's area with comfy reading nooks!

resources.name: Sunset Park Splash Pad
resources.description: Water play area perfect for hot summer days.

review001.comment: Kids love this place! Perfect for cooling off in summer.

review002.comment: Great splash pad but could use more seating for parents.

review003.comment: My kids have so much fun here! Very clean water.

review004.comment: Good for younger kids but older ones might get bored.

resources.name: Kids Art Studio
resources.description: Creative space for art classes and workshops.

review001.comment: Amazing art classes! My daughter Emma loves coming here.

review002.comment: Great instructors and creative projects for all ages.

review004.comment: Good classes but could use more variety in projects.

review005.comment: My daughter Sofia loves the painting classes!

resources.name: Family Sports Center
resources.description: Indoor sports facility with family-friendly programs.

review001.comment: Perfect for my son Jake! Great soccer programs.

review002.comment: Good facilities but classes can be expensive.

review003.comment: My son Jin loves the basketball program!

review005.comment: Good for active kids but could use more programs for younger ones.

resources.name: Nature Discovery Center
resources.description: Interactive nature exhibits and outdoor learning programs.

review001.comment: Fantastic educational programs! My kids love the hands-on exhibits.

review002.comment: Amazing place for learning about nature! Great for all ages.

review003.comment: Perfect for family outings and educational fun.

review004.comment: Great exhibits but could use more interactive elements.

review005.comment: Wonderful staff and engaging programs for kids!

resources.name: Community Garden
resources.description: Family-friendly garden plots and educational programs.

review001.comment: Love our community garden! Great for teaching kids about nature.

review002.comment: My daughter Grace loves helping in the garden!

review003.comment: Good educational programs but could use more kid-friendly tools.

review004.comment: Nice concept but plots are hard to get.

resources.name: Music School for Kids
resources.description: Music lessons and group classes for children.

review001.comment: My kids love their music lessons here! Great teachers.

review002.comment: My daughter Min loves the piano classes!

review003.comment: Good music education but classes can be pricey.

review004.comment: My twins love the group singing classes!

review005.comment: Great instructors but limited instrument options.

resources.name: Emergency Childcare Center
resources.description: 24/7 emergency childcare for working parents.

review001.comment: Lifesaver for working parents! Staff is very caring.

review002.comment: Good emergency care but expensive for regular use.

review003.comment: Very reliable and my kids feel safe here.

review004.comment: Great for emergencies but limited space.

resources.name: Odense Zoo
resources.description: Family-friendly zoo with over 2,000 animals and interactive exhibits. Perfect for children of all ages with playgrounds and picnic areas.

review001.comment: Amazing zoo! My kids loved the lions and the playground. Great family day out.

review002.comment: Beautiful zoo with lots of space. Food is expensive but worth it for the experience.

resources.name: Brandts Museum of Art
resources.description: Contemporary art museum with family-friendly exhibitions and workshops. Offers guided tours for children and interactive art activities.

review001.comment: Great art museum with interesting exhibits. Kids enjoyed the interactive sections.

review002.comment: Perfect for introducing children to art. The workshops are fantastic!

resources.name: Odense Skatepark
resources.description: Modern skatepark with ramps, bowls, and street obstacles. Suitable for beginners to advanced skaters. Safety equipment available for rent.

review001.comment: Best skatepark in the area! My son loves it here. Great for all skill levels.

review002.comment: Well-maintained park with good facilities. Can get crowded on weekends.

resources.name: Odense Public Library - Children's Section
resources.description: Extensive children's library with reading programs, storytelling sessions, and educational activities. Free membership for all children.

review001.comment: Wonderful library! My kids love the story time sessions and the huge book collection.

review002.comment: Excellent children's section with helpful staff. Great educational programs.

resources.name: Odense Swimming Center
resources.description: Modern swimming facility with multiple pools, water slides, and swimming lessons for all ages. Family changing rooms available.

review001.comment: Great swimming center with clean facilities. My kids love the water slides!

review002.comment: Excellent swimming lessons for children. Professional instructors.

resources.name: Hans Christian Andersen Museum
resources.description: Interactive museum dedicated to the famous Danish author. Features fairy tale exhibits, storytelling sessions, and children's workshops.

review001.comment: Magical place! My children were enchanted by the fairy tale exhibits.

review002.comment: Beautiful museum with engaging exhibits. Great for introducing kids to literature.

resources.name: Odense Adventure Playground
resources.description: Large adventure playground with climbing structures, zip lines, sandpits, and natural play areas. Perfect for active children.

review001.comment: Amazing playground! My kids can spend hours here. Great for all ages.

review002.comment: Excellent playground with lots of different activities. Well-maintained equipment.

resources.name: Odense Science Center
resources.description: Interactive science museum with hands-on experiments, planetarium shows, and educational workshops for children and families.

review001.comment: Fantastic science center! My kids love the interactive exhibits and experiments.

review002.comment: Excellent educational experience. The planetarium shows are amazing!

resources.name: Odense Music School
resources.description: Professional music school offering lessons in piano, guitar, violin, drums, and voice for children of all ages. Group classes available.

review001.comment: Great music school with talented teachers. My daughter loves her piano lessons.

review002.comment: Excellent music education. The teachers are patient and encouraging.

resources.name: Odense Children's Hospital Playroom
resources.description: Bright and welcoming playroom for children visiting the hospital. Staffed by child life specialists with toys, games, and activities.

review001.comment: Wonderful playroom that makes hospital visits less scary for children.

review002.comment: Amazing staff who really care about making children comfortable.

alert001.title: Coyote spotted near park
alert001.message: Be cautious around the Maple Grove area. Keep pets and children close.

alert002.title: Construction work on Main St
alert002.message: Heavy construction work may affect traffic to community center.

alert003.title: High pollen count today
alert003.message: Pollen levels are very high. Consider indoor activities for allergy sufferers.

alert004.title: Lost dog in neighborhood
alert004.message: Golden retriever named Max lost near Fitness Park. Please contact if seen.

alert005.title: Community event reminder
alert005.message: Don't forget the potluck this Saturday at 6 PM!

feedback001.title: Add allergy filter to playdate match
feedback001.description: It would be great to match parents based on allergies.

feedback002.title: Location not updating correctly
feedback002.description: My location shows incorrectly on the map.

feedback003.title: Add language preference filter
feedback003.description: Would love to connect with other Korean-speaking families.

feedback004.title: Photo sharing in conversations
feedback004.description: It would be helpful to share photos in messages.

feedback005.title: Better activity search filters
feedback005.description: The activity search could use more specific filters.
